Use three quick buttons in the context m: 在上下文菜单中使用三个快捷按钮
Enable A~Z sorting of new nodes in the c: 启用上下文菜单中新节点的A~Z排序
Enable automatic nesting of subdirectori: 启用上下文菜单中子目录的自动嵌套
Enable Up/Down/Left/Right to jump to the: 启用上/下/左/右方向键跳转到最近节点
Enable Alt+1~9 to paste node templates i: 启用Alt+1~9将节点模板粘贴到工作流中
Enable Shift+Ctrl+Left/Right to normaliz: 启用Shift+Ctrl+左/右方向键规范化选中节点
Enable Shift+Up/Down/Left/Right and Shif: 启用Shift+上/下/左/右和Shift+Ctrl+Alt+左/右方向键对齐选中节点
Enable Shift+r to unload model and node: 启用Shift+r卸载模型和节点缓存
Enable Shift+g to add the selected nodes: 启用Shift+g将选中节点添加到组
Enable chaining of get and set points wi: 启用与父节点的获取和设置点链式连接
